name: The Borde-Gay Bordeaux Tour!
description: With the Borde-gay city tour, guests will be able to walk around the city in an afternoon, experiencing local culture, history, restaurants, and wine bars! History will be mixed with culture as guests will be given easy to digest information about some of the main points of the city all while stopping at local cafes and wine bars to do that quintessential of all French things: People Watch.  Should guests be more included towards the nightlife scene, all they have to do is ask and I can adjust the tour to be a gay bar crawl (about three bars) of Bordeaux finishing off at the local gay club the Stereo!
